verses.verse: There was a man <WH376> in the land <WH776> of Uz <WH5780>, whose name <WH8034> was I-yov <WH347>; and that man <WH376> was perfect <WH8535> and upright <WH3477>, and one that feared <WH3373> 'Elohim <WH430>, and eschewed <WH5493> <WH8802> evil <WH7451>.
And there were born <WH3205> <WH8735> unto him seven <WH7651> sons <WH1121> and three <WH7969> daughters <WH1323>.

His substance <WH4735> also was seven <WH7651> thousand <WH505> sheep <WH6629>, and three <WH7969> thousand <WH505> camels <WH1581>, and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> yoke <WH6776> of oxen <WH1241>, and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> she asses <WH860>, and a very <WH3966> great <WH7227> household <WH5657>; so that this man <WH376> was the greatest <WH1419> of all the men <WH1121> of the east <WH6924>.

And his sons <WH1121> went <WH1980> <WH8804> and feasted <WH4960> <WH6213> <WH8804> in their houses <WH1004>, every one <WH376> his day <WH3117>; and sent <WH7971> <WH8804> and called <WH7121> <WH8804> for their three <WH7969> sisters <WH269> to eat <WH398> <WH8800> and to drink <WH8354> <WH8800> with them.

And it was so, when the days <WH3117> of their feasting <WH4960> were gone about <WH5362> <WH8689>, that I-yov <WH347> sent <WH7971> <WH8799> and sanctified <WH6942> <WH8762> them, and rose up early <WH7925> <WH8689> in the morning <WH1242>, and offered <WH5927> <WH8689> burnt offerings <WH5930> according to the number <WH4557> of them all: for I-yov <WH347> said <WH559> <WH8804>, It may be <WH194> that my sons <WH1121> have sinned <WH2398> <WH8804>, and cursed <WH1288> <WH8765> 'Elohim <WH430> in their hearts <WH3824>. Thus did <WH6213> <WH8799> I-yov <WH347> continually <WH3117>.

Now there was a day <WH3117> when the sons <WH1121> of 'Elohim <WH430> came <WH935> <WH8799> to present <WH3320> <WH8692> themselves before the YY <WH3068>, and Satan <WH7854> came <WH935> <WH8799> also among <WH8432> them.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Satan <WH7854>, Whence <WH370> comest <WH935> <WH8799> thou? Then Satan <WH7854> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, From going to and fro <WH7751> <WH8800> in the earth <WH776>, and from walking up and down <WH1980> <WH8692> in it.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Satan <WH7854>, Hast thou considered <WH7760> <WH8804> <WH3820> my servant <WH5650> I-yov <WH347>, that there is none like him in the earth <WH776>, a perfect <WH8535> and an upright <WH3477> man <WH376>, one that feareth <WH3373> 'Elohim <WH430>, and escheweth <WH5493> <WH8802> evil <WH7451> ?
Then Satan <WH7854> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Doth I-yov <WH347> fear <WH3372> <WH8804> 'Elohim <WH430> for nought <WH2600> ?

Hast not thou made an hedge <WH7753> <WH8804> about him, and about <WH1157> his house <WH1004>, and about all that he hath on every side <WH5439>? thou hast blessed <WH1288> <WH8765> the work <WH4639> of his hands <WH3027>, and his substance <WH4735> is increased <WH6555> <WH8804> in the land <WH776>.
But <WH199> put forth <WH7971> <WH8798> thine hand <WH3027> now, and touch <WH5060> <WH8798> all that he hath, and he will curse <WH1288> <WH8762> <WH3808> thee to thy face <WH6440>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Satan <WH7854>, Behold, all that he hath is in thy power <WH3027>; only upon himself put not forth <WH7971> <WH8799> thine hand <WH3027>. So Satan <WH7854> went forth <WH3318> <WH8799> from the presence <WH6440> of the YY <WH3068>.

And there was a day <WH3117> when his sons <WH1121> and his daughters <WH1323> were eating <WH398> <WH8802> and drinking <WH8354> <WH8802> wine <WH3196> in their eldest <WH1060> brother's <WH251> house <WH1004>:

And there came <WH935> <WH8804> a messenger <WH4397> unto I-yov <WH347>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, The oxen <WH1241> were plowing <WH2790> <WH8802>, and the asses <WH860> feeding <WH7462> <WH8802> beside <WH3027> them:

And the Sabeans <WH7614> fell <WH5307> <WH8799> upon them, and took them away <WH3947> <WH8799>; yea, they have slain <WH5221> <WH8689> the servants <WH5288> with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>; and I only am escaped <WH4422> <WH8735> alone to tell <WH5046> <WH8687> thee.

While he was yet speaking <WH1696> <WH8764>, there came <WH935> <WH8802> also another, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, The fire <WH784> of 'Elohim <WH430> is fallen <WH5307> <WH8804> from heaven <WH8064>, and hath burned up <WH1197> <WH8799> the sheep <WH6629>, and the servants <WH5288>, and consumed <WH398> <WH8799> them; and I only am escaped <WH4422> <WH8735> alone to tell <WH5046> <WH8687> thee.

While he was yet speaking <WH1696> <WH8764>, there came <WH935> <WH8802> also another, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, The Chaldeans <WH3778> made out <WH7760> <WH8804> three <WH7969> bands <WH7218>, and fell <WH6584> <WH8799> upon the camels <WH1581>, and have carried them away <WH3947> <WH8799>, yea, and slain <WH5221> <WH8689> the servants <WH5288> with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>; and I only am escaped <WH4422> <WH8735> alone to tell <WH5046> <WH8687> thee.

While he was yet speaking <WH1696> <WH8764>, there came <WH935> <WH8802> also another, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Thy sons <WH1121> and thy daughters <WH1323> were eating <WH398> <WH8802> and drinking <WH8354> <WH8802> wine <WH3196> in their eldest <WH1060> brother's <WH251> house <WH1004>:

And, behold, there came <WH935> <WH8804> a great <WH1419> wind <WH7307> from <WH5676> the wilderness <WH4057>, and smote <WH5060> <WH8799> the four <WH702> corners <WH6438> of the house <WH1004>, and it fell <WH5307> <WH8799> upon the young men <WH5288>, and they are dead <WH4191> <WH8799>; and I only am escaped <WH4422> <WH8735> alone to tell <WH5046> <WH8687> thee.

Then I-yov <WH347> arose <WH6965> <WH8799>, and rent <WH7167> <WH8799> his mantle <WH4598>, and shaved <WH1494> <WH8799> his head <WH7218>, and fell down <WH5307> <WH8799> upon the ground <WH776>, and worshipped <WH7812> <WH8691>,

And said <WH559> <WH8799>, Naked <WH6174> came I out <WH3318> <WH8804> of my mother's <WH517> womb <WH990>, and naked <WH6174> shall I return <WH7725> <WH8799> thither: the YY <WH3068> gave <WH5414> <WH8804>, and the YY <WH3068> hath taken away <WH3947> <WH8804>; blessed <WH1288> <WH8794> be the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068>.
In all this I-yov <WH347> sinned <WH2398> <WH8804> not, nor charged <WH5414> <WH8804> 'Elohim <WH430> foolishly <WH8604>.
